messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a whoop of rodents have stampeded into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Harm No-Moon X, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Transfer Centre.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a swarm of rodents have swarmed into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Harm No-Moon X, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that all of the station's bots/animals has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: #4nd%;f4y6,>ï¿½%-BZZZZZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: What's up y'all?

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Our Cap is dead

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Morgue Maintenance.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: And our radio servers are dead too

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Also we got the wild lizard on our station with all access, which came from the lavaland

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Cargo shuttle commandeered by CentCom.

The cargo shuttle should return in 5 minutes.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Time for the Shuttle

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Bow Solar Array.
